import sys

    
def main():
    line = sys.stdin.readline()
    A,B = line.split()
    A = int(A)
    B = int(B)
    print((A+B)%24) 

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

def main():
    a, b = map(int, input().split())
    print((a + b) % 24)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

import sys

def main():
    line = sys.stdin.readline()
    hours, minutes = line.split()
    hours = int(hours)
    minutes = int(minutes)
    print((hours+minutes)%24)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

    print((a + b) % 24)
